name: 扬科叔叔
summary: Agnes Varda went to San Francisco to promote her film "Les Creatures". Tom Luddy on Pacific Film Archives told her : "There is a man called Varda on a boat in Sausalito. Are you related?". "I dont know, lets find out" Agnes Varda replied. They went there on a thursday and met this Yanco (Jean Varda) who was the cousin of her fathers. So she made this little movie about this ...
